column5: Hey Guys,I own the Tilted Toque Wilderness Lodge on the Upper French River, Ontario, Canada (previously known as Casablanca Lodge). While I understand the uncertainty with the current situation we're in, we ARE still accepting bookings for the 2020 Season. All deposits will be returned in full (or credit given if requested) if the isolation hasn't been lifted by your arrival date. Please check us out and don't hesitate to message me if you have any questions. Hoping for the best,TerryG
Hoping the best for you and all the other outfitters
I did this once. Place went belly up and I never got my deposit back.
What a drag! I just got the place a couple years ago. First season we had widespread Forest Fires. Second season we had flooding and extremely high waters. This will be our third season, lol.
I'd consider really looking into this place!
